changeSet.author: tomd8451
changeSet.comment: This table lists all the coupons sent to customers as part of a campaign, as well as the products for which each coupon is redeemable.

createTable.remarks: Lists the campaigns received by each household in the study. Each household received a different set of campaigns.

column.name: CAMPAIGN
column.remarks: Number that uniquely identifies each campaign. Ranges 1 - 30

column.name: COUPON_UPC
column.remarks: Uniquely identifies each coupon (unique to household and campaign)

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.remarks: Number that uniquely identifies each product
